content.body: Good evening to all. I wonder where I can find the specification for the automatic creation of variables using the id of HTML elements. Should I look in the ES or HTML spec, and what is the term for this auto creation?
They're not variables. In JS, when you use a variable name that isn't in scope, it's looked up as a property of the global object (`window` in this case)
